availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, physician. New York native. Married to Joanna Sidney Anderson Hewett in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 21, 1847. Father of Mary S. Hewett and Edward A. Hewett. Physician in Louisville in 1850. Physician in Louisville in 1860. Chairman of the Kentucky Medical Board in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 248B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 364.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482707, p. 370 of 495 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Dr Robert Carson Hewett (1812-1891)," Memorial #13529066, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13529066 (accessed December 15, 2020).
KYR-0002-161-0032.
